onboarding_subtitle: Select a Persona that best fits your task.
goal_tagline: Reploid is a self-modifying agent with live browser access and extensive tooling to build, refactor, and evolve your codebase.
goal_examples: Try goals like "Build a real-time dashboard", "Add multi-provider AI routing", or "Refactor this module with new patterns".
multi_model_description: Define primary, fallback, and consensus models for Paxos orchestration.
